FuncDef:
The statistic discard enable command enables the function to collect discarded BUM packets in a bridge domain (BD).
The undo statistic discard enable command disables the function to collect discarded BUM packets in a BD.
By default, the function to collect discarded BUM packets in a BD is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you run the display bridge-domain statistics command to check statistics about discarded BUM packets in a BD for fault locating, run the statistic discard enable command in the BD view to enable the function to collect discarded BUM packets in a BD. If you do not enable the function, statistics about discarded BUM packets in a BD cannot be collected.
Prerequisites
Packet statistics collection in a BD has been enabled using the statistic enable command.
Follow-up Procedure
After the statistic discard enable command is run, run the display bridge-domain statistics command to check statistics about discarded BUM packets in a BD. The command output helps diagnose faults.
Precautions
Running the undo statistic enable command disables the function to collect statistics about discarded BUM packets.
